title: CardCheassy
description: A unique game combining card-based strategy with tactical chess-like gameplay.
longDescription: CardCheassy is an experimental project merging classic chess logic with modern card-game mechanics. Players use cards to execute moves, position units, and ultimately aim to destroy the opponent's King piece. It challenges players to think positionally while managing the flexibility of a card-driven hand, creating unique tactical scenarios in every match. The core loop focuses on decision-making, area control, and risk-reward balance.
mechanics: Unit positioning on a grid-based board
systems: Card hand and deck flow management
roadmap: Expansion of card variety and archetypes
Major UI/UX polish and feedback pass

title: Maggie
description: Stat-based 2D RPG platformer featuring sophisticated melee and ranged combat systems.
longDescription: Maggie is an action-RPG developed in a side-scrolling format. The project's primary focus is building a stat-heavy, element-sensitive combat experience. Players engage with enemies using a variety of tools: parrying, countering, combo attacks, and elemental damage types. The system is designed to be highly responsive, featuring dynamic directionality and satisfying knockback effects.
mechanics: Combo, Jump attack, and Wall jump attack variants

title: SpaceShooter2D
description: Top-down space shooter with free roaming, loot drops, and ship upgrade systems.
longDescription: SpaceShooter2D is a top-down prototype focused on exploration and combat within asteroid fields. The core gameplay loop involves navigating through space, fighting off enemy squadrons, and gathering loot to upgrade the player's ship components such as engines, shields, and weapons.
mechanics: Combat against meteors and enemy craft
Multiple weapon types and shield mechanics
systems: Weapon, Engine, and Shield upgrade systems

title: Drone Shooter 3D
description: A 3D drone shooter prototype developed using Unreal Engine Blueprints.
longDescription: Drone Shooter 3D was created as a deep-dive into Unreal Engine's Blueprint system. It focuses on aerial movement, aiming, and combat logic from a third-person perspective. The project serves as a technical study for movement feel and combat loops in a 3D arena.
roadmap: Combat feedback and game feel improvements

title: Split Fiction Prototype
description: An experimental project merging Side-scroller and TPS perspectives.
longDescription: Split Fiction Prototype explores the transition between 2D side-scrolling and 3D third-person perspectives within a single fluid experience. The project serves as R&D for camera transitions, movement mode switching, and experimental control schemes.
